sentences.sentence: The current is swiftest in the middle of the river.
The grouse season opens in Britain, but which game bird can make the swiftest escape?
sentences.translation: 英伦松鸡狩猎季节开始，哪种猎禽能胜利大逃亡？

sentences.sentence: They have two decades of growing prosperity to point to, certainly the swiftest, most extensive rise out of poverty any nation has seen.
sentences.translation: 他们会指出中国经历了20年的经济日益繁荣。当然，相对于世界上任何国家来说，也是脱离贫困最快最广泛的国家。
